Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Violation of Advertising Policy - The brand name in your ad doesn’t align with the product landing page you are advertising. Please make necessary adjustments to have your brand name align with your product.

It seems like your ad might have been flagged for a violation related to the brand name used in your advertisement. This could happen if the brand name in your ad does not match the one associated with your product or company. To resolve this issue, I recommend reviewing our Ad Policy and Standards to ensure compliance with our guidelines. You can find more details in our policy document here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out!
